00070     public function SetServer ( $server )
00081     {
00082         if ( !$this->isConnected() )
00083         {
00084             $this->server = $server;
00085             
00086             return NULL;
00087         }
00088         else
00089         {
00090             // connexion non fermée
00091             $errs = new Errors();
00092 
00093             $errs->Add ( new BDDError ( BDDError::CONNECTION_NOT_CLOSED , 'You cannot modify host address when connection is not closed.' ) );
00094                     
00095             return $errs;
00096         }
00097     } //----- End of SetServer
00098     
00099     public function GetServer ( )
00106     {
00107         return $this->server;
00108     } //----- End of GetServer

00256     function __construct( $server = '' , $username = '' , $password = '' )
00257         /*
00258          * initialises members of the object.
00259          * interrupts script if DataBase is not supported.
00260          *
00261          * @param $server the host address
00262          * @param $username the login to be used for connection
00263          * @param $password the password associated to the login
00264          *
00265          */

00267                 parent::__construct( );

00273                 $this->password = $password;

00275                 $this->database = '';
